title: january 7: four globes, three billboards
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the film Three Billboards Outside Ebbing Missouri, and the history making Golden Globe Awards that followed. Then, she talks about the release of a favorite Rihanna song, Stay. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
